message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly, it's a fair deal.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still deserve more
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still need a good share.
You're losing value, I'm being generous
I'm getting a bad deal here, but I'm willing to give you a bit more to avoid getting nothing at all.
You're running out of time, I'm being reasonable
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. We are both losing money with each passing round.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm making a counteroffer. This is as good as it gets
This is my final, final offer.  I'm giving you a small share, but it's better than nothing.  If you reject this, we both get nothing.
You're running out of options, this is as generous as I'll be
This is the last chance. I'm taking almost everything, but at least you get something.  We both get nothing if you reject.
